dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.enterprise.risk.sec.inc.SecurityIncidentAssessment
dataStructure.description:
Provides the analysis of how the incident occured, what actor performed the attack which caused the incident, and the operational and techincal impact to the organization.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: SecurityIncidentAssessment

child.name: incidentCause
child.description:
Free text description of the cause of an intrusion

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: incidentCause

child.name: weaknessAllowingIncidentToOccur
child.description:
Weakness that allowed the incident to take place. Enumerated List: No AntiVirus Signature AntiVirus Not Turned On AntiVirus Not Up To Date AntiVirus Not Properly Configured AntiVirus Software Not Installed No Patch Available Not Patched Patch Installed but Not Effective Currently Under Extension (Waiver Status) Weak Password Poor System Configuration Poor Network Configuration Social Engineering Inside No Policy Available Policy Enforced Compromised Information Trusted Network Access Other

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: weaknessAllowingIncidentToOccur

child.name: securityIncident

This association end is optional
child.label: securityIncident
